segments.text: Oh no, look at that sink just flooding the whole counter area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is oblivious, polishing that plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's splashing down onto the floor, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she keeps going without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids over there, climbing for cookies like little thieves.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that shaky stool, one wrong move and he'll crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just egging him on, hand out for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't anyone paying attention to this disaster waiting to happen?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks perfect, but inside it's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she's missing all this right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are spilling out, adding to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR
